languages.text: {n}Это какой-то абстрактный рисунок, возможно, принадлежащий к какой-то деградантной художественной школе, кои частенько подвергаются гонениям Экклезиархии за надругательство над иконописным каноном.{/n}
{n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Это какой-то абстрактный рисунок, возможно, принадлежащий к какой-то деградантной художественной школе, кои частенько подвергаются гонениям Экклезиархии за надругательство над иконописным каноном.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}
{n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}
{n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}
{n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这看起来像是某种抽象画作，与国教对艺术方面的规定格格不入，或许是某种遭到国教严令禁止的异端艺术画作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这看起来像是某种抽象画作，与国教对艺术方面的规定格格不入，或许是某种遭到国教严令禁止的异端艺术画作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}それはある種の抽象的なイメージのようなものだった。そのスタイルは、おそらく宗教的な芸術の規範に反するものであり、しばしば帝国聖教会から迫害される類の、退廃的なもののようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}それはある種の抽象的なイメージのようなものだった。そのスタイルは、おそらく宗教的な芸術の規範に反するものであり、しばしば帝国聖教会から迫害される類の、退廃的なもののようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece una imagen abstracta, posiblemente del estilo de una escuela de arte degenerado perseguida por la Eclesiarquía por ultrajes contra sus cánones artísticos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece una imagen abstracta, posiblemente del estilo de una escuela de arte degenerado perseguida por la Eclesiarquía por ultrajes contra sus cánones artísticos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes face à une image abstraite, dans un style rappelant celui des écoles d'art dégénéré qui sont régulièrement persécutées par l'Ecclésiarchie pour outrages envers le canon artistique religieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes face à une image abstraite, dans un style rappelant celui des écoles d'art dégénéré qui sont régulièrement persécutées par l'Ecclésiarchie pour outrages envers le canon artistique religieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist eine Art abstraktes Bild, wie es möglicherweise an einer entarteten Kunstschule gelehrt wurde, die von der Verfolgung durch die Ekklesiarchie wegen Verstößen gegen den religiösen künstlerischen Kanon betroffen war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist eine Art abstraktes Bild, wie es möglicherweise an einer entarteten Kunstschule gelehrt wurde, die von der Verfolgung durch die Ekklesiarchie wegen Verstößen gegen den religiösen künstlerischen Kanon betroffen war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir çeşit soyut resim. Dinsel sanatsallık nizamnamesine karşı olduğu için Ekleşiarşi tarafından sıklıkla cezalandırılan, dejenere bir sanat okulunun tarzında gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is some kind of abstract image, possibly in the style of some degenerate school of art frequently persecuted by the Ecclesiarchy for outrages against the religious artistic canon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir çeşit soyut resim. Dinsel sanatsallık tanımına karşı olduğu için Ekleşiarşi tarafından sıklıkla cezalandırılan, dejenere bir sanat okulunun tarzında gibi duruyor.{/n}
